DOC.brief_summary: Study Cohort: All Children (Age: 3 months- 18 years, corrected age upto 2 years for preterm children) with Chronic Liver Disease attending Pediatric Hepatology Out Patient Department/In Patient Department
DOC.brief_title: Nutritional Assessment Tool in Childhood Chronic Liver Disease
DOC.criteria: 1. Children from age of 3 months 18 years (corrected age upto 2 years for preterm children) 2. Chronic liver disease. 1. Any metabolic or endocrinal diseases independently affecting nutritional status 2. Refusal to give written informed consent to participate in the study
